metadata.title: CVE-2020-13143 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
gadget_dev_desc_UDC_store in drivers/usb/gadget/configfs.c in the Linuxkernel 3.16 through 5.6.13 relies on kstrdup without considering thepossibility of an internal '\0' value, which allows attackers to trigger anout-of-bounds read, aka CID-15753588bcd4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-40-generic - 5.4.0-40.44
linux-image-5.4.0-40-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-40.44
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-40-generic - 5.4.0-40.44
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-40-lowlatency - 5.4.0-40.44
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1018-kvm - 5.4.0-1018.18
No subscription required
